  • Uses of NamePartJoiner in andesite.util.metadata

    Fields in andesite.util.metadata declared as NamePartJoiner
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static NamePartJoiner NamePartJoiner.DASHED
    Joins the strings with a dash (-) character.
    static NamePartJoiner NamePartJoiner.HTTP_HEADER
    Joins the strings with a dash (-) character, after converting them to Title Case.
    static NamePartJoiner NamePartJoiner.LOWER_CAMEL_CASE
    Joins the strings after converting all but the first into Title Case.
    Methods in andesite.util.metadata that return NamePartJoiner
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default NamePartJoiner NamePartJoiner.afterMapping​(java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> mapper)
    Returns a new joiner that will join the strings resulting from applying the provided function to each part.
    static NamePartJoiner NamePartJoiner.joinWith​(java.lang.String separator)
    Joins the parts with the provided separator.
